text: Michele Salvemini Better known as Caparezza (Born in 1973) is an Italian rapper from Molfetta in Apulia. Before the current pseudonym he was known as Mikimix, a B boy pop Singer. == References == Category:Italian singer- songwriters Category:21st-century Italian singers Category:21st-century Italian songwriters Category:Italian singers Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:People from Apulia Category:Italian rappers
title: Caparezza
